column5: ITP - E1401A - Captain's Culvert Inlet Remediation - Parking bay Construction
column11: ITP - E1401A - Captain's Culvert Inlet Remediation - Parking bay Construction

column5: Detail - Set out pegs installed every 20m if no grader control or 100m if grader control is used during Subgrade Construction
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Detail - Site Engineer and CPS Engineer to undertake a Proof Roll test on the trimmed subgrade prior to Sub base placement
Frequency - Prior to Sub Base Construction
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Aggregate material compliance for Subbase stockpiles
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Crushed AP65 with 30% Crushed face. Lab test for MDD at OWC
Records - Notice to Supplier and Lab Test results for the stockpiles used during construction

Detail - All aggregate loads coming to site to have delivery dockets checked to ensure material is coming from the correct stockpile. Site Engineer to keep a running tally of material delivered to site and docket number
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measurement and recording
Conformance Criteria - Comply with TNZ M/4 Specification. Traceability of all materials deliveresd to site
Records - Delivery Dockets, Aggregate Deliveries Register
Detail - Material is spread from truck & trailers and any contamination is removed or loads are to be rejected if material is non compliant
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Carry out a Level Check on the trimmed Basecourse
Frequency - 1/100m if machine control is used or 1/20m if no machine control
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measurement
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - NDM Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Avg. >= 95% MDD and Min. >= 92% MDD
Frequency - Prior to base course Construction
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measurement
Conformance Criteria - No point of the surface shall vary more than 10mm over a 3m long straight edge
Detail - Aggregate material compliance for base Course stockpiles
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Aggreate shall comply with TNZ M/4
Records - Notice to Supplier and Lab Test results for the stockpiles used during construction

Detail - All aggregate loads coming to site to have delivery dockets checked to ensure material is coming from the correct stockpile. Site Engineer to keep a running tally of material delivered to site and docket number
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measurement and recording
Conformance Criteria - Comply with TNZ M/4 Specification. Traceability of all materials deliveresd to site
Records - Delivery Dockets, Aggregate Deliveries Register
Detail - Mat sampling of Basecourse Material
Frequency - 1 mat sample for the job. Pavement CPS Engineer for further instruction
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab testing
Conformance Criteria - Grading to comply with specification
Records - Mat sample lab test result
Detail - Material is spread from truck & trailers and any contamination is removed or loads are to be rejected if material is non compliant
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Carry out a Level Check on the trimmed Basecourse
Frequency - 1/100m if machine control is used or 1/20m if no machine control
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measurement
Conformance Criteria - Tolerance = -5mm/+15mm if constrained (kerb) Tolerance = -5mm/+5mm
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - NDM Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Avg. >= 98% MDD and Min. >= 95% MDD
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measurement
Conformance Criteria - No point of the surface shall vary more than 10mm over a 3m long straight edge
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection by CPS Engineer after site sweeping
Conformance Criteria - The large and small aggregates are held in place and the matrix does not displace under normal trafficking or sweeping
Detail - Seal design to be reviewed prior to sealing
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Review
Detail - Mark up extent of chipseal
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Markout
Detail - To confirm that all loose material is removed from the surface and surrounding area.
Frequency - Prior to application of binder
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Detail - Ensure the Binder application is according to the seal design
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measure
Conformance Criteria - According to seal design
Detail - Ensure the Chip application is according to the seal design
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measure
Conformance Criteria - According to seal design
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual
Conformance Criteria - Ensure sufficient passes with roller to embed chip (typically 4-5 passes)
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all excess chip removed from site. No chip windrows left on site in Shoulders.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual
Detail - Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Drawings
ITP - E1401A - Captain's Culvert Inlet Remediation - Subsoil Drainage
column11: ITP - E1401A - Captain's Culvert Inlet Remediation - Subsoil Drainage

column5: Detail - Engineer to confirm the extend of sub soil drain on site
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Markout
2 - Locate existing services by hand digging
Detail - Ensure all services in conflict with the line of trench are exposed by hand digging
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Potholing
Conformance Criteria - All conflicts have been located
Detail - Ensure Subsoil Drainage pipe is TNZ F2 Grade and 110 Diameter
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Ensure delivery docket matches materials delivered
Conformance Criteria - 110mm diameter Drain flow TNZ F/2 Grade pipe
Detail - Free draining granular Fill Comply with NZTA F/5 2013
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Ensure delivery docket matches materials delivered
Conformance Criteria - Ensure clean drainage chip
Detail - Ensure the geotextile filter fabric,strenght Class D in Accordance with TNZ F/7 2003
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Ensure delivery docket matches materials delivered
Conformance Criteria - Strenght Class D in Accordance with TNZ F/7 2003
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection and measurement
Conformance Criteria - Record levels of base of trench on dip sheet
Detail - Ensure the trench is cut in a manner than will ensure that the pipes will be laid true to the depths, grades and lines shown on the drawings.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection and measurement
Conformance Criteria - Ensure trench line and levels match the design drawings
Detail - CPS Engineer to be informed of unsuitable ground or seepage in Trench and instruct testing and remedial works.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - CPS Engineer to instruct action and record on dip sheet and as built drawing
Detail - Upon completion of trenching Geotextile Filter fabricto be placed into the trench. Accordance with with TNZ F/7 :2003
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure material covers the trench and is pinned in place
Detail - Ensure 100mm thick Free draining granular Fill bedding is placed in base of trench.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Record levels of top of bedding on dip sheet
Detail - Ensure Subsoil Pipe is laid on the Bedding in the centre of the trench
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Consistency with Subsoil Details
Detail - As built Survey the Pipe before backfill
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review
Conformance Criteria - Consistency with Subsoil Details
Detail - Free draining granular Fill into the trench
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Detail - Cover over the trench so that chip does not get contaminated by other construction activities - this might be with the pavement material or by cloth if other work is going to take place
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Detail - Hynds Round 250mmm Lamphole cover and frame or simislar approved
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Consistency with Subsoil Details
Detail - The Engineer needs to inspect the subsoil drain installed
Frequency - After subsoil drain has been installed
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Detail - Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Drawings
